caption.center: A.M. Kan, appellee, v. Mandel Sensibar and J.R. Sensibar, defendants, on

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, Chicago, First District.

opinion.posture:
Judgment for plaintiff on promissory note.
Appeal from the Municipal Court of Chicago; the Hon. Joseph W. Schuhnan, Judge, presiding. Heard in the third division of this court for the first district at the October term, 1926.
opinion.attorneys: E.S. J.W. Cummings, for appellant. Eastman, White, Hawxhurst Lind, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Presiding Justice Taylor delivered the opinion of the court.
